articles.title: Dravid drops 'Iyer, Rahul' hint for Asia Cup, WC after India's loss in WI T20Is - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Dravid, after admitting to India's shortcomings in the T20I series against Windies, delivered a stunning update for Asia Cup and World Cup. | Cricket
articles.content: A horror loss befell Team India in Florida as for the first time in over 17 years they lost a bilateral series (minimum three matches) against West Indies. Standing on the verge of a historic win aft… [+2396 chars]

articles.title: Closing bell: Sensex ends day at over 65,400; Nifty at 19,435 - Hindustan Times
